title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC Review
description: This RFC outlines the gathering and documentation of detailed requirements for the self-healing infrastructure system. It includes functional and non-functional requirements, target environments, stakeholder needs, a preliminary list of advanced materials and IoT sensors to be used. The document is currently in a DRAFT state, awaiting feedback or further refinement. Please review, provide comments, suggestions for improvement, or request clarification if necessary. This task has been assigned to the code-architect.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flows, and communication protocols.

title: Selection of Advanced Materials and IoT Sensors for Self-Diagnosis and Self-Repair Infrastructure
description: Conduct comprehensive research on advanced materials and IoT sensors suitable for self-diagnosis and self-repair capabilities. Evaluate potential candidates based on factors such as durability, self-healing properties, cost, availability, compatibility with the overall system architecture, environmental impact, sustainability, and eco-friendliness. Prepare a detailed report that includes recommended materials/sensors, their rationales, potential challenges, and mitigation strategies. Additionally, provide an overview of the methodology used for research and evaluation to ensure transparency and reproducibility. Update the report periodically during the review process to reflect any new findings or changes. Upon completion, update the 'rfc_state' field to 'APPROVED_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION'.

title: Develop Self-Diagnosis and Self-Repair Algorithms
description: Design and implement algorithms for self-diagnosis and self-repair based on sensor data and system health monitoring.

title: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform
description: Design and develop a platform for collecting, storing, and analyzing sensor data and system health data.

title: Develop User Interfaces and Dashboards
description: Design and implement user interfaces and dashboards for monitoring system health, configuring self-healing parameters, and visualizing data.
dependencies: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform

title: Implement Security and Access Controls (Revised)
description: This task aims to design, develop, and implement a robust and comprehensive security system for the SelfHealingInfrastructure project. The focus will be on industry-standard authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols (such as OAuth2, TLS/SSL), and access controls. The security strategy will encompass all aspects of the infrastructure, including physical infrastructure, software components, and data transmission. Adherence to best practices, regular reviews and updates for emerging threats, collaboration with team members, thorough documentation, testing, integration checks, and transitions to subsequent phases are essential. Additionally, consider implementing multi-factor authentication, intrusion detection systems, security incident response plans, and ensure alignment with relevant industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, etc.). Upon completion, the implementation state should be updated, and this task can then be assigned to a suitable team member for further development.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the self-healing infrastructure system.

title: Conduct System Testing and Validation
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and system tests, to validate the self-healing capabilities and overall system functionality.
dependencies: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for system administrators, maintainers, and end-users.
